meanings.sent1: I cabled the message to my friend.

meanings.definition: A thick rope of wire or nonmetallic fiber.
meanings.sent1: The ship's anchor was attached to a sturdy cabled.
meanings.sent2: She wrapped the cabled around the post to secure it.
meanings.sent3: The cabled held the weight of the bridge effortlessly.

meanings.sent5: The cabled was used to tow the car out of the ditch.
